DOC.brief_summary: This study is conducted in Europe. The aim of the study is to gather information about hypoglycaemia (low blood glucose) among patients with Type 1 or Type 2 diabetes mellitus. The study is both retrospective and prospective.
DOC.brief_title: An International Survey on Hypoglycaemia Among Insulin-treated Patients With Diabetes
DOC.criteria: Patients with Type 1 or Type 2 diabetes mellitus treated with insulin for more than 12 months Patients giving informed consent to participate in the survey Nonambulatory patients Illiterate patients and patients otherwise unable to complete a written survey
